name: Summer Glass Boi
description:
A mini game I made for the Game Maker's Toolkit game jam!

Play as a little cool boi who uses glasses to manipulate blocks of color to do neat puzzling!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Enter - Switch Color

Hope you like it!

My twitter: @Agelvik

Music by

Goto80 - http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Goto80/

Rolemusic - http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/
